name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Full Stack Developer (Java, Microservices, Spring Boot, API, ReactJS)
professional_summary: Utilized Java and Spring Boot to build scalable microservices, ensuring high performance and maintainability, while collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver robust backend solutions.
Developed and integrated RESTful APIs using Java, focusing on security and reusability, which streamlined data exchange between frontend and backend systems.
Engineered responsive UI components with ReactJS and Redux, enhancing user experience and ensuring seamless interaction with backend services.
Designed and optimized SQL and NoSQL databases, ensuring data integrity and high availability, while writing efficient queries to support application functionality.
Implemented DevOps practices using Git, Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes to automate builds, deployments, and monitoring, improving release cycles.
Wrote comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure code quality and maintainability, adhering to best practices and industry standards.
Collaborated in an Agile/Scrum environment with product owners, business analysts, and QA engineers, contributing to sprint planning and timely delivery.
Optimized application performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks, ensuring compliance with security and regulatory standards.
Integrated ReactJS with backend APIs, creating a seamless user experience and improving overall application responsiveness.
Managed state using Redux, ensuring consistent data flow across the application and reducing bugs related to state management.
Implemented secure authentication and authorization mechanisms using Spring Security, protecting sensitive data and ensuring user privacy.
Used TypeScript to enhance code quality and maintainability in ReactJS applications, reducing runtime errors and improving developer productivity.
Deployed applications on AWS, leveraging services like EC2 and RDS to ensure scalability and reliability, while monitoring performance using CloudWatch.
Conducted code reviews and provided constructive feedback to team members, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing.
Troubleshot and resolved complex issues in production environments, minimizing downtime and ensuring high availability of services.
Participated in daily stand-ups, sprint retrospectives, and backlog grooming sessions, contributing to process improvements and team efficiency.
Mentored junior developers, helping them understand best practices and technologies, and accelerating their onboarding process.
Stayed updated with emerging technologies and industry trends, proposing innovative solutions to enhance application functionality and user experience.
